About Me

BIO

I am a motivated junior pursuing a major in Computer Science with a minor in Data Science.
My academic pursuits have given me a solid foundation in technology as well as a keen interest in leveraging data for actionable insights.
Aside from my studies, I am actively exploring the world of entrepreneurship, motivated by a desire to create meaningful and transformative solutions.
I am excited about working with dynamic teams and contributing my skills to cutting-edge projects.
I look forward to connecting with forward-thinking organizations that value both proficiency and a spirit of innovation.

My Tools:

Python, JavaScript, C/C++

Front-End and Back-End

My Tools:

ReactJS, Vanilla JavaScript,HTML5/CSS3, Node.js, Express.js and MongoDB
